creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: tan leather jacket; rectangular sleeves; wide collar and front opening hem; collar and front opening hem is black on exterior and tan on interior with off-white characters on both sides at neck and chest; thick dark brown woven cord with large tassel at end attached to leather loop at interior seam of opening lining on each side at chest; interior of jacket is black; white rectangular geometric pattern on front of jacket on lower area of torso and on back on lower area of torso; large white circle containing character on upper back
title: Fireman's coat
